Quote: Water. Earth. Fire. Air. Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony. Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.
Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them, but when the world needed him most, he vanished.
Katara, you shouldn't have gone on that ship! Now we could all be in danger!
The foreigner(aang) is banished from our village.
Don't you see? Aang's brought us something we haven't had in a long time: fun.
Fun?! We can't fight firebenders with fun!
Fine! Then I'm banished, too! Come on Aang, let's go.
So, you're leaving the South Pole? This is goodbye?
Thanks for penguin sledding with me.
Aang, don't go! I'll miss you!
Wow, I haven't cleaned my room in a hundred years. Not looking forward to that.
All right, ready our defenses! The Fire Nation could be on our shores any moment now!
No potty breaks!
Yeah, I liked her(katara) too.
I've spent years preparing for this encounter. Training, meditating. You're just a child!
Well, you're just a teenager.
Head a course for the Fire Nation. I'm going home.
We have to go after that ship, Sokka. Aang saved our tribe, now we have to save him
It's been so long since I've had hope, but you brought it back to life, my little waterbender.
Aang is the Avatar. He's the world's only chance. You both found him for a reason. Now your destinies are intertwined with his.
Get in, we're going to save your boyfriend
You just looove taking me out of my comfort zone, don't you?
So, I guess you've never fought an airbender before. I bet I could take you both with my hands tied behind my back.
Up. Ascend. Elevate.
Ha! That's from the Water Tribe!
Good news for the Fire Lord. The Fire Nation's greatest threat is just a little kid.
According to legend, you need to first master water, then earth, then fire, right?
the world's been waiting for the Avatar to return and finally put an end to this war.
Sokka, I'm sure you'll get to knock some firebender heads on the way.
I'm just a guy, with a boomerang.
